line.comment: * Add-Ons 1.2: The starting options MUST be completed first before being allowed to use the data scanner.
* This prevents exploits in insane mode where the player could get blueprints before the TS/TP research restriction comes into play.
* Mordan3 fix.
* * DEBUG **
* $t = 'target: ' + $target
* write to player logbook $t
* Add-Ons 1.3: Freighters cannot be scanned on insane.
* else if $distance > $maxDistance
* display info box: text= $message.outrange, icon= $icon, timeout= $subWait, fadeout= $fade

line.text: 'Ваша империя может использовать только корабли машин.'

line.comment: * Mordan2 - Advanced ships cannot be scanned.
* Add-Ons 1.3: On insane mode, TS and TP cannot be scanned.
* Zero Hour 1.10 allowed to scan OCV ships
* valid target
* Herobetty 5.3: Moved set local variable to when the scan completes.
* $target-> set local variable: name='mayhem_scanLocked' value=[TRUE]
* start scanning
* Finish.
* Herobetty 5.3: Moved set local variable to when the scan completes.
* Zero Hour 1.10
* Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode reduces bonus research points to 1.5x as much instead of 2x.
* scan complete
* data download finished
* Scan Interrupted
* Mordan4 - Scan wreck to initiate renegades plot questions.
* if the player finds the special wreck used for entry into the hidden system and they scan it, we present them with plot questions
* scan negative
* Scan Positive, Energy Signature Found, tracing location
* Call the Challenge script which asks questions and then free up the scanner.

sval.val: Ваша империя может использовать только корабли машин
Экзотическое Покрытие. Данные получены.
Add-Ons 1.2: The starting options MUST be completed first before being allowed to use the data scanner.
This prevents exploits in insane mode where the player could get blueprints before the TS/TP research restriction comes into play.
Mordan3 fix.
* DEBUG **
$t = 'target: ' + $target
write to player logbook $t
Add-Ons 1.3: Freighters cannot be scanned on insane.
else if $distance > $maxDistance
display info box: text= $message.outrange, icon= $icon, timeout= $subWait, fadeout= $fade
Mordan2 - Advanced ships cannot be scanned.
Add-Ons 1.3: On insane mode, TS and TP cannot be scanned.
Zero Hour 1.10 allowed to scan OCV ships
valid target
Herobetty 5.3: Moved set local variable to when the scan completes.
$target-> set local variable: name='mayhem_scanLocked' value=[TRUE]
start scanning
Herobetty 5.3: Moved set local variable to when the scan completes.
Zero Hour 1.10
Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode reduces bonus research points to 1.5x as much instead of 2x.
scan complete
data download finished
Scan Interrupted
Mordan4 - Scan wreck to initiate renegades plot questions.
if the player finds the special wreck used for entry into the hidden system and they scan it, we present them with plot questions
scan negative
Scan Positive, Energy Signature Found, tracing location
Call the Challenge script which asks questions and then free up the scanner.
